description_part1: Get a backup solution with automatic daily remote backups, timely notifications, and centralised monitoring – all securely stored in a Vault on OVHcloud Object Storage. Install the backup agent in under 15 minutes at no cost. You only pay for the Object Storage you use.
description_part2: Follow our guides to get started quickly.

guide1.title: Cost and Billing
guide1.description: This documentation details the pricing and billing for Backup Agent.

guide2.title: First-time configuration
guide2.description: A step-by-step guide to help you set up and run your first backup.

guide3.title: Frequently asked questions
guide3.description: A guide with frequently asked questions, covering the most common issues.

no_baremetal_available: Order a Bare Metal server, and secure it with Backup Agent
save_a_baremetal_server: Back up a Bare Metal server
baremetal_label_delay_order: Once your order is confirmed, this screen will be updated, and you will receive an email when your Backup Agent is delivered. You can track your order’s status <OrderLink>here</OrderLink>.
baremetal_label_order_in_progress: Your order has been processed and is on its way. You can track its status <OrderLink>here</OrderLink>.
first_order_terms_and_conditions_descrip: To activate your service, it is necessary to create a Backup Tenant. Do you wish to continue the activation of your service?
first_order_terms_and_conditions_confirm: I have read and accept the terms and conditions, the appendix relating to the processing of personal data and the special terms and conditions of OVH services.
first_order_terms_and_conditions_annexe_: Annex on the Processing of Personal Data
